scripts.dev:client: cd client && ${PM:-$(command -v bun >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo bun || echo npm)} run dev
scripts.dev: concurrently "${PM:-$(command -v bun >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo bun || echo npm)} run dev:client" "${PM:-$(command -v bun >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo bun || echo npm)} run dev:server"
scripts.build: cd client && ${PM:-$(command -v bun >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo bun || echo npm)} run build && cargo build --release
scripts.check: cd client && ${PM:-$(command -v bun >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo bun || echo npm)} run check && cargo check --workspace
